name: vain-pilot
description: - 1.1. Go to the directory/folder named "loadVainDBfromTSV". - 1.2. run npm install. - 1.3. Change userid and password to your specific DB credentials. - 1.4. run the following command 'node vaininstall.js' .

scripts.start: (cd init-database && npm install && npm start) && ((cd vain-backend && npm install && npm test) & (cd vain-client && npm install && npm start))
scripts.test: (cd init-database && bun install && bun start) && ((cd vain-backend && bun install && bun test) & (cd vain-client && bun install && bun start))

author: Daniel Chung
